text: The Russian Empire, also known as the Tsarist Russia, Tsarist Empire or Imperial Russia, and sometimes simply as Russia, was a country in Europe and Asia from November 1721 until its collapse in March 1917. It later became the Russian Soviet Federative Socialist Republic, or Russian SFSR, as part of the Soviet Union. By the late 19th century, it covered about , making it the third-largest empire in history. ==Notes== ==References== Category:Former empires Category:Former monarchies of Asia Category:Former monarchies of Europe Category:Former monarchies of North America Category:History of Russia Category:1721 establishments Category:1917 disestablishments Category:1720s establishments in Europe Category:1720s establishments in Asia Category:1910s disestablishments in Europe Category:20th-century disestablishments in Asia Category:History of Europe Category:History of Asia Category:History of North America Category:Empires in Europe Category:Empires in Asia Category:Russian Empire
title: Russian Empire
